replies.body: It's a game by Supercell, the same developer that made Clash of Clans. It's somewhat similar to Clash of Clans and Hearthstone. Check out "Chief Pat" on YouTube and watch his Clash Royale videos if you want to learn more about Clash Royale.

replies.body: It's like a Tower defence game, when the aim is to destroy the other person's towers. Like et said, you could go check out some videos. Chief Pat, Galadon, Molt and many others play it.

replies.body: Clash Royale is extremely easy to pick up and it's very fast paced compared to previous Supercell games. I personally enjoy it more than Clash of Clans mainly because it's not active/time-to-win so you can download it and get right into the action and still get the highest ranking cards available. I love it!
replies.body_tagged: Clash Royale is extremely easy to pick up and it's very fast paced compared to previous Supercell games. I personally enjoy it more than Clash of Clans mainly because it's not active/time-to-win so you can download it and get right into the action and still get the highest ranking cards available. I love it!

replies.body: The game seems good, it's just a bit ridiculous how the match making goes. It shouldn't put you in a match with someone who has all the rares, epics, etc. of that arena.
replies.body_tagged: The game seems good, it's just a bit ridiculous how the match making goes. It shouldn't put you in a match with someone who has all the rares, epics, etc. of that arena.

replies.body: You don't have to have epics and rares to win. Some are easily countered.

replies.body: Yeah, I know, I'm just saying you get a huge choke point when you destroy one tower and you've got witches and those horseback Knights. xd I've been trying to find strategies to kill them off, but it's still pretty hard for me, haha.
